text: Aap farma dijiye kay mein khud apni zaat-e-khaas kay liye kissi nafay ka ikhtiyar nahi rakhta aur na kissi zarar ka magar utna hi jitna Allah ney chaha ho aur agar mein ghaib ki baaten janta hota to mein boht say munafay hasil ker leta aur koi nuksan mujh ko na phonchta mein to mehaz daraney wala aur bisharat denay wala hun unn logon ko jo eman rakhtay hain
